thread.section_title: Hotel Giuliana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic host, good location
thread.title_full: Fantastic host, good location - Review of Hotel Giuliana, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Hayleigh A
title: Fantastic host, good location
text: Fantastic location, ten minutes walk from the Trevi and Pantheon but also the station. Room was clean and beds comfortable. Paid for the room via the website directly and very reasonable. Didn't spend a huge amount of time at the hotel due to exploring the city for hours, but would definitely recommend.
